verses.verse: Judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and plead <S%H7378><s%> <S%H8798><s%> my cause <S%H7379><s%> against an ungodly <S%H3808><s%> <S%H2623><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>: O deliver <S%H6403><s%> <S%H8762><s%> me from the deceitful <S%H4820><s%> and unjust <S%H5766><s%> man <S%H376><s%>.

For thou art the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of my strength <S%H4581><s%>: why dost thou cast me off <S%H2186><s%> <S%H8804><s%>? why go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8691><s%> I mourning <S%H6937><s%> <S%H8802><s%> because of the oppression <S%H3906><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> ?

O send out <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thy light <S%H216><s%> and thy truth <S%H571><s%>: let them lead <S%H5148><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me; let them bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me unto thy holy <S%H6944><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%>, and to thy tabernacles <S%H4908><s%>.

Then will I go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the altar <S%H4196><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, unto 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> my exceeding <S%H8057><s%> joy <S%H1524><s%>: yea, upon the harp <S%H3658><s%> will I praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

Why art thou cast down <S%H7817><s%> <S%H8709><s%>, O my soul <S%H5315><s%>? and why art thou disquieted <S%H1993><s%> <S%H8799><s%> within me? hope <S%H3176><s%> <S%H8685><s%> in 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: for I shall yet praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him, who is the health <S%H3444><s%> of my countenance <S%H6440><s%>, and my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.
